```{r load packages, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

V2: TESTING THE R-VERSION COMPARED TO ORIGINAL VERSION
Loading R-version

```{r v0 all unsorted, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
v0_all_us_unsorted <- read_csv("allUS_unsorted.csv")
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
v1_all_us_polclaims <- read_csv("all_us_pol_claims_updated_sep15.csv")
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
v2_5parties <- v1_all_us_polclaims %>%
  filter(claimant_party == "Republican"|
           claimant_party == "Democratic"| 
         claimant_party == "Independent"|
         claimant_party == "Libertarian"| 
         claimant_party == "unknown_affiliation")

v2_5parties %>%
  count(publisher.site) %>%
  kable(caption = "All Claims in 5 Parties
        Sorted by Publisher")

dim(v2_5parties)
```

Loading Grace Original Version

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
grace_v2 <- read_csv("gracesoriginaldata.csv")

grace_v2 %>%
  count(publisher.site) %>%
  kable(caption = "All Claims in 5 Parties
        Sorted by Publisher")

dim(grace_v2)
```

Data counts work out!
```{r}
weird_titles <- anti_join(v2_5parties, grace_v2, by = c("title")) %>%
  select(title, ...1)
print(weird_titles)
weird_text <- anti_join(v2_5parties, grace_v2, by = c("text")) %>%
  select(text, ...1)
print(weird_text)
weird_textualRating <- anti_join(v2_5parties, grace_v2, by = c("textualRating")) %>%
  select(textualRating, ...1)
print(weird_textualRating)
```


V3: TESTING THE R-VERSION COMPARED TO ORIGINAL VERSION
Loading R-version

```{r}
v3_deduped <- v2_5parties %>%
  select(url:claimant_party) %>%
  distinct()

v3_deduped %>%
  count(publisher.site) %>%
  kable(caption = "All Claims in 5 Parties
        Sorted by Publisher")

dim(v3_deduped)
```

Loading Grace version
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
grace_v3 <- read_csv("gracededupeddata.csv")

grace_v3 %>%
  count(publisher.site) %>%
  kable(caption = "All Claims in 5 Parties
        Sorted by Publisher")

dim(grace_v3)
```


Data Counts are not the same: why?
